#### The published [paper](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/ddi.12853) and [data](https://github.com/KerstinJantke/ConsTarget), including the "ConsTarget" R package, are available on-line.

The metrics in this paper have been adopted by the European Comission Digital Observatory for Protected Areas to measure representation achievement. See [here](https://dopa.jrc.ec.europa.eu/var/www/app/app/static/dopa/files/factsheets/en/DOPA%20Factsheet%20B4%20EN%20Representativity%20by%20Protected%20Areas.pdf) for more information.
